00011 void showFreq( PairCount& pairs, SingleCount& singlesF, SingleCount& singlesE, Lexicon& f, Lexicon& e)
00012 {
00013         for (pairs.begin(); !pairs.isEnd(); pairs.next())
00014         {
00015         pair<unsigned int, unsigned int> wordpair = pairs.current();
00016         double relFreq_f = -log(((double)pairs.getFreq(wordpair))/((double)singlesF.getFreq(wordpair.first)));
00017         double relFreq_e = -log(((double)pairs.getFreq(wordpair))/((double)singlesE.getFreq(wordpair.second)));
00018         cout << relFreq_f << " " << relFreq_e << " # " << f.getWord(wordpair.first) << " # " << e.getWord(wordpair.second) << endl;
00019         }
00020 }
